item.title: Simple Encryptor Walkthrough - HackTheBox
item.description:
clevrf0x

$ Simple Encryptor Walkthrough - HTB

Hello, and welcome! In this article, I’ll walk you through solving the “Simple Encryptor” reversing challenge from the platform HackTheBox. Since I haven’t done much in the realm of CTF or any kind of cybersecurity challenges for a while, my approach might not be perfect, and there may be some incorrect assumptions along the way. If you notice anything off, feel free to reach out, and I’ll be happy to correct it.
item.content:
clevrf0x

$ Simple Encryptor Walkthrough - HTB

Hello, and welcome! In this article, I’ll walk you through solving the “Simple Encryptor” reversing challenge from the platform HackTheBox. Since I haven’t done much in the realm of CTF or any kind of cybersecurity challenges for a while, my approach might not be perfect, and there may be some incorrect assumptions along the way. If you notice anything off, feel free to reach out, and I’ll be happy to correct it.

Please keep in mind that I’m primarily a developer with no formal experience in reverse engineering or tools like Ghidra or IDA Pro, and my understanding of assembly is quite limited.

Challenge Information

Now that we’ve set the stage, let’s dive into the challenge itself. The description provided is as follows:
